title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3064/82 of 18 November 1982 on adjustments to the free-at-frontier offer price for hybrid maize for sowing
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3064/82
of 18 November 1982
on adjustments to the free-at-frontier offer price for hybrid maize for sowing
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the purposes of fixing the free-at-frontier offer price for hybrid maize for sowing, the adjustments referred to in Article 3 of Regulation (EEC) No 1578/72 shall be made in accordance with the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 November 1982.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 246, 5. 11. 1971, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 382, 31. 12. 1981., p. 37.
(3) OJ No L 168, 26. 7. 1972, p. 1.
